resources.string:
Don’t know where to start? Relax, let us help you! NShare is designed to be simple and yet effective.
How to write new note;
1. Click the plus (+) icon on bottom right.
2. Enter title and description of your note.
3. Click save.
It is that simple!
How to delete a note;
1. Click the share icon on bottom right of note.
2. Choose App/channel to share.
3. Share it.
Sounds interesting right?
How to edit note;
1. Click the pencil icon on bottom left of note.
2. Edit title and/or description of your note.
3. Click save.
So easy, right?
How to delete a note;
1. Slide a note either left or right.
It’s gone!
NB: No recovery possible, choose wisely!
How to refresh all notes list;
1. Click three dots on top right.
2. Click ‘Refresh’.
How to delete all notes;
1. Click three dots on top right.
2. Click ‘Clear all notes’.
NB: No recovery possible, choose wisely!
To know which version of NShare installed;
1. Click three dots on top right.
2. Click ‘About NShare’.
To know your information;
1. Click three dots on top right.
2. Click ‘My Information’.
Need a break? To sign-out;
1. Click three dots on top right.
2. Click ‘Sign Out’.
